timeAttack.title: TIME ATTACK
timeAttack.description: Experience authentic 2-axis motion with lean angles up to 54° and full wheelie control.
timeAttack.fullDescription: The Time Attack model gives you the experience of two movement axis. The first axis is for the leaning and the second one is for the front suspension and wheelie control. Yes, you can be wheeleing all day long.

specs.transport: 4 wheels on the platform for easy transportation

slady.title: SLADY
slady.description: Master the art of drifting with our 3-axis system that adds rear wheel sliding control.
slady.fullDescription: The Slady model takes you to another level, applying this third sliding axis, you will manage the sliding dose leaving every single corner. A part from the wheelie and lean axis, the fun will be increased further more.

specs.transport: 4 wheels on the platform for easy transportation

topGun.title: TOP GUN
topGun.description: The ultimate experience with 4-axis motion including forward/backward movement based on acceleration.
topGun.fullDescription: The Top Gun is the bike. If the three axis were not enough for you, this one will be a holly experience, adding the velocity axis which means that depending on the velocity or braking level, it moves forward or reverse. The total immersion has arrived.

features.velocity: 4th axis: Controls the movement when accelerating and braking

specs.transport: 4 wheels on the platform for easy transportation

about.title: About
about.subtitle: DevotionSim
about.description: Born from a passion for racing and a dedication to engineering excellence.
about.missionText1: At DevotionSim, we bridge the gap between virtual racing and real-world physics. Our mission is to provide professional riders and enthusiasts with the most realistic training tools available.
about.missionText2: We believe that simulation isn't just a game—it's a crucial tool for development, safety, and performance improvement.

values.innovationDesc: Constantly pushing the boundaries of motion technology.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.subtitle: Us
contactPage.description: Ready to experience the ultimate simulation? We're here to help.
contactPage.heroSubtitle: Ready to bring the ultimate simulation to your event, business, or circuit? We're here to help you.
contactPage.whatsappMessage: You can also write to us on WhatsApp or call us directly.
contactPage.privacyMessage: We will never share your data with third parties.

whatToExpect.title: What can you expect when contacting us?
whatToExpect.point1: Personalized advice based on your type of event or business.
whatToExpect.point2: Recommendations on the most suitable simulator and content.
whatToExpect.point3: Clear information about pricing, logistics, and timelines.
whatToExpect.point4: Support before, during, and after the event.

socialProof.title: They have already trusted our simulators

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take you to respond?
faq.q2: Can you ship or install the simulator outside Spain?
faq.a2: Yes, we study the logistics according to your country or city.
faq.q3: Can I rent the simulator for just one day or weekend?
faq.a3: We offer flexible options for events, fairs, and promotions.
faq.a4: Yes, we can advise you on the ideal purchase and configuration.

vr.title: BEYOND REALITY
vr.subtitle: Step into the circuit. Feel every turn. Total immersion with VR integration.

features.universalDesc: Compatible with all major VR headsets including Meta Quest, HTC Vive, and Valve Index.
features.gameReadyDesc: Seamless integration with MotoGP™ series, Ride 4, and Assetto Corsa.
features.zeroLatencyDesc: Optimized telemetry for lag-free sync between motion and visuals.

immersion.title: Feel the
immersion.description: Our proprietary software translates every bump, turn, and acceleration directly to the simulator chassis. When combined with VR, your brain is tricked into believing you're truly on the track.

useCases.title: Who is
useCases.subtitle: Versatility meets performance. Choose your path.

professional.desc: For professional riders who need to train muscle memory, learn new tracks, and recover from injuries without risk.

entertainment.desc: The ultimate gaming experience. Feel the adrenaline of MotoGP at home. Challenge friends and compete online.

events.desc: A unique attraction for fairs, booths, and brand activations. Attracts crowds, generates interaction, and offers an unforgettable immersive experience.

leisure.desc: Ideal for arcades, entertainment centers, and recreational spaces looking to offer an exciting and immersive motorcycle simulation experience.

speed.title: Speed & Acceleration
speed.desc: Feel the real thrust of the bike when opening the throttle fully.

lean.title: Cornering Lean
lean.desc: Lean up to 54° with total confidence and millimeter precision.

vibration.title: Vibrations & G-Force
vibration.desc: Every bump, curb, and braking is transmitted to your body.

sound.title: Surround Sound
sound.desc: The roar of the engine and the wind surround you completely.

immersion.title: Immersive VR Experience
immersion.description: Forget screens. With our VR technology, you are INSIDE the circuit. The perception of speed and distance is absolute.

env360.title: 360º Environment
env360.desc: Look wherever you want, you are the rider.

spatialAudio.title: Spatial Audio
spatialAudio.desc: Locate your rivals just by sound.

naturalInteraction.title: Natural Interaction
naturalInteraction.desc: Your movements control the action instinctively.

compatibility.title: Total Compatibility
compatibility.description: Our simulators are designed to work with the most demanding titles on the market.

site.name: DevotionSim
site.defaultDescription: Experience the thrill of professional MotoGP racing with DevotionSim's high-performance motorcycle simulators. Official MotoGP simulators for training, entertainment, and events.

home.title: DevotionSim | Professional MotoGP Simulators & Racing Experience
home.description: Discover premium motorcycle simulators with up to 4-axis motion systems. Official MotoGP simulators for professional training, entertainment centers, and events. Experience authentic circuit sensations.
home.keywords: motorcycle simulator, motogp simulator, racing simulator, bike simulator, professional training, VR racing, motion simulator, circuit training, devotionsim

simulators.title: Motorcycle Simulators | Time Attack, Slady & Top Gun Models
simulators.description: Explore our range of professional motorcycle simulators: Time Attack (2-axis), Slady (3-axis drift), and Top Gun (4-axis complete motion). Built for 24/7 operation with lean angles up to 54°.
simulators.keywords: time attack simulator, slady simulator, top gun simulator, 2-axis motorcycle simulator, 3-axis drift simulator, 4-axis motion simulator, professional racing simulator

reviews.title: Customer Reviews & Testimonials | DevotionSim Experience
reviews.description: Watch video testimonials from professional MotoGP riders and event customers. See why thousands trust DevotionSim for the most realistic motorcycle simulation experience.
reviews.keywords: customer reviews, professional riders testimonials, motogp riders, simulator reviews, customer feedback, event testimonials

events.title: Events & MotoGP Grand Prix | DevotionSim Presence Worldwide
events.description: DevotionSim at MotoGP Grand Prix and international events. Over 380+ Grand Prix, 470+ total events, and 28,000+ participants since 2018. Bring excitement to your next event.
events.keywords: motogp events, grand prix, motorcycle events, simulator rental, event activation, corporate events, trade shows, fan zone

rentPurchase.title: Rent or Buy Motorcycle Simulators | Get Your DevotionSim
rentPurchase.description: Flexible rental and purchase options for DevotionSim motorcycle simulators. Global shipping, expert installation, and comprehensive warranty. Perfect for businesses, events, and entertainment centers.
rentPurchase.keywords: buy motorcycle simulator, rent simulator, simulator purchase, simulator rental, global shipping, business simulator, entertainment center equipment

about.title: About DevotionSim | Passion for Racing & Engineering Excellence
about.description: Learn about DevotionSim's mission to bridge virtual racing and real-world physics. Built by riders for riders, we create the most realistic motorcycle training tools available.
about.keywords: about devotionsim, company mission, racing passion, engineering excellence, simulator manufacturer, professional training tools

contact.title: Contact Us | DevotionSim - Professional Simulator Inquiries
contact.description: Get in touch with DevotionSim for simulator inquiries, event rentals, or purchase information. Based in Madrid, Spain with global shipping. Response within 24 hours guaranteed.
contact.keywords: contact devotionsim, simulator inquiry, rental information, purchase inquiry, global shipping, madrid spain, customer support

vr.title: VR Experience | Immersive MotoGP Racing with Virtual Reality
vr.description: Total immersion with VR-compatible motorcycle simulators. Compatible with Meta Quest, HTC Vive, Valve Index. Experience MotoGP, Ride 4, and Assetto Corsa in stunning virtual reality.
vr.keywords: vr motorcycle simulator, virtual reality racing, meta quest compatible, motogp vr, immersive racing, vr gaming, 360 degree racing
